fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you can start setting up a concert. A concert takes 1 day to prepare. Once prepared, you gain a day ability. Using it will cause everyone to gather at your concert for the entire night. Everyone in the game will be unable to perform their night action. In addition to this, a night chat consisting of all alive players is brought up for the night, and all other night chats are disabled. This bypasses roleblock immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune.
- If a player rolls Popstar and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
You started setting up a concert.
You decided to hold a concert tonight.
The Popstar held a concert, and everyone gathered around to watch~!
